author: brownsr
name: BelaLugosi
description:
A straightforward default-cinnamon-but-darker panel theme, with red-tinged panels and popups, matched with a dark window theme.  Left and Right panels are inset at top and bottom.  The overall effect is part dark, with light window panels but all header and control bars dark. 

Compatible with cinnamon 3.2

Turn on the matching window borders and controls for the intended effect
